title: RICOTTA AND POMEGRANATE BRUSCHETTA
directions: Preheat the oven to 425Â°F. Place the bread slices onto a large baking sheet. Bake until lightly toasted, about 8 minutes.
In a small bowl, stir together the ricotta and lemon zest. Top each piece of toast with the ricotta mixture.
Sprinkle with the pomegranate arils, thyme and (if using) fleur de sel.
